root@9893678f722d:/app# glpsol --mip --write solution.txt /app/question.mps; tmux wait -S done
bash: glpsol: command not found

grep: solution.txt: No such file or directory
root@9893678f722d:/app#

{"state_analysis":"The command 'glpsol' is not found, indicating that the GLPSOL solver is likely not installed in this environment. Consequently, the solution file 'solution.txt' was not created, leading to the second command failing due to the absence of this file.","explanation":"We need to install the GLPK package to use the 'glpsol' command, which is required to solve the mixed integer programming problem. After installing, we will attempt to run the solver again and then extract the objective value.","commands":[{"keystrokes":"apt-get update && apt-get install -y glpk-utils
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":120},{"keystrokes":"glpsol --mip --write solution.txt /app/question.mps
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":60},{"keystrokes":"grep 'Objective value' solution.txt | awk '{print int($3)}' > answer.txt
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10}],"is_task_complete":false}

keystrokes.title: Keystrokes

is_blocking.description: Whether to wait for and return the terminal output after executing these keystrokes. This will append '; tmux wait -S done' to your command.DO NOT block on modifier keys or inside interactive programs (e.g. vim or less). Only block when the command is executed in the command line, is not interactive, and you expect the output to be returned with no intervention. When in doubt, wait instead of blocking.
is_blocking.title: Is Blocking

timeout_sec.description: The number of expected seconds to wait for the command to complete.
timeout_sec.title: Timeout Sec

messages.content:
root@9893678f722d:/app# glpsol --mip --write solution.txt /app/question.mps; tmux wait -S done
bash: glpsol: command not found
root@9893678f722d:/app# grep 'Objective value' solution.txt | awk '{print int($3)}' > answer.txt; tmux wait -S done
grep: solution.txt: No such file or directory
root@9893678f722d:/app#

{"state_analysis":"The command 'glpsol' is not found, indicating that the GLPSOL solver is likely not installed in this environment. Consequently, the solution file 'solution.txt' was not created, leading to the second command failing due to the absence of this file.","explanation":"We need to install the GLPK package to use the 'glpsol' command, which is required to solve the mixed integer programming problem. After installing, we will attempt to run the solver again and then extract the objective value.","commands":[{"keystrokes":"apt-get update && apt-get install -y glpk-utils
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":120},{"keystrokes":"glpsol --mip --write solution.txt /app/question.mps
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":60},{"keystrokes":"grep 'Objective value' solution.txt | awk '{print int($3)}' > answer.txt
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10}],"is_task_complete":false}

{"state_analysis":"The GLPK package has been successfully installed. However, the command 'glpsol' returned an invalid option error because the correct syntax does not include '--mip'. This indicates that we may need to use a different command structure to solve the problem and generate the solution file.","explanation":"We will attempt to run 'glpsol' again without the '--mip' option to solve the MPS file. After that, we will extract the integer part of the objective value from the solution file if it is created successfully.","commands":[{"keystrokes":"glpsol --write solution.txt /app/question.mps\n","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":60},{"keystrokes":"grep 'Objective value' solution.txt | awk '{print int($3)}' > answer.txt\n","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10}],"is_task_complete":false}
